Sentencas: In this article, a novel rhombohedral interconnector with a staggered position is proposed by considering the influence of flow field variations on heat and mass transfer.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The rhombohedral staggered interconnectors help to alter the fluid flow patterns in the flow channels, leading to an improvement in heat and mass transport behavior.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It also assists to control the pressure distribution in the flow channels and improves the performance of anode-supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: First, a comparison between existing experimental research and a traditional rectangular interconnector model is carried out to validate the physics of the SOFC functioning.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Then the performance of a staggered-position rhombohedral interconnector is evaluated to that of a typical rectangular interconnector.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To further understand the impact of flow rate on cell performance, parametric research with varied mass flow rates is conducted.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The findings indicate that when compared to a conventional rectangular interconnector, the rhombohedral staggered interconnector design enhances the power density by 33.9%.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With an increase in mass flow rate beyond a specified stoichiometric range, the performance decreases indicating an excessive supply of reactants.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using the proposed staggered rhombohedral interconnector configuration, the SOFC can be designed to operate optimally.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel rhombohedral interconnector configuration for planar solid oxide fuel cells
